feed.title: GoDoxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.15.2
entry.content:
Fixes / Changes

  • Notification: fix custom JSON payload validation for webhook provider
  • WebUI
  • Visuals: Improved visuals and animation for "Proxies" and "System Info" page
  • Routes
    • Display exposed ports for docker containers in proxies page
    • Add button for full detail in proxies page
  • Config Editor
    • Fixed missing provider field in Notification providers editor
    • Improved internal state management and performance

Screenshots

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.15.3
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Updated icon data URL for selfh.st to fix: failed to update icons error="invalid character '<' looking for beginning of value"
  • Fixed UI config editor not in sync with YAML editor

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.16.0
entry.content:
New

  • modify_html middleware, inject / replace HTML with CSS selector. Doc: https://docs.godoxy.dev/Middlewares#modify-html

yaml labels: proxy.#1.middlewares.modify_html: | target: body html: <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://theme-park.dev/css/base/sonarr/dracula.css">

Changes

  • Updated to go 1.24.5
  • Updated dependencies

Fixed

  • homepage.url not applying properly #134

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.16.1
entry.content:
New features

  • Middleware themed: inject CSS more easily, and apply predefined dark themes CSS to apps that does not support dark mode

| Option | Description | Allowed Values | | ------------- | ------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------- | | theme | Predefined theme name | dark, dark-grey, solarized-dark | | font_url | Custom Font URL | Full URL | | font_family | Font family name of above font | string | | css | Custom CSS | URL, File with file:// prefix, Full CSS |

Example:

yaml app: middlewares: themed: theme: dark font_url: https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;700&display=swap font_family: Inter css: | body { color: red !important; } # or css: file://path/to/custom.css # or css: https://example.com/custom.css

  • Health checking:
  • New retries option: notify "Service went down" only after retries consecutive failures. Defaults to 3 or 15s divided by interval. Example: yaml app: healthcheck: interval: 10s retries: 3

Changes

  • Middleware: Improved modify_html middleware performance with bytes pool
  • Autocert: Improved retry logic and added cooldown period across container restarts to avoid rate limiting
  • Updated dependencies for both frontend and proxy
